results.definition: (of facilities such as telephones or lavatories) unavailable for use by anyone else or indicating unavailability; (`engaged' is a British term for a busy telephone line)
(used of toothed parts or gears) interlocked and interacting
having ones attention or mind or energy engaged
built against or attached to a wall

examples: the carpenter engaged (or employed) for the job is sick
the desperately engaged ships continued the fight
